name: Luxury Jetsetter
tagline: First-class treatment, Park Hyatt robes, 3+ cents per point redemptions
description: You don’t just travel — you arrive. Park Hyatt Paris for 30k points, private transfers, trip delay insurance that actually pays out when your bag does ballet in Frankfurt. This is the setup for people who want the very best redemptions and protections without running 17 cards.

slots.name: The Hub
slots.description: Unlocks transfer partners + 1.5x portal + god-tier insurance.

slots.name: Multiplier Engine
slots.description: Feeds the hub with 3–5x on everyday spend → transferable.

slots.name: Rent & Dining Engine
slots.description: If you pay rent, Bilt turns it into points (1x) and adds 3x dining / 2x travel that still feed your hub.

rules.title: Reserve > Preferred
rules.description: If you can offset the fee, Reserve wins every time — insurance + 1.5x portal is worth way more than $455 difference.

rules.title: Feed The Beast
rules.description: Everything non-bonus goes on Freedom Unlimited → transfer to Reserve → redeem Hyatt, Virgin, United, SW for 3–6 cpp.

rules.title: No Redemption Under 2.5 cpp
rules.description: If it's not at least 2.5 cents per point, use the portal or go home.

name: Wallet Freak
tagline: The Final Boss — Issuers Fear You
description: You track every Amex Offer, every retention script, every pay-yourself-back category. Banks literally send you letters begging you to slow down. You are the endgame.

slots.name: Premium Hub Trio
slots.description: You run all three because you can offset every fee and abuse every ecosystem.

slots.name: Food Warlord
slots.description: Maximum calories-to-points conversion.

slots.name: Pure Feeder Layer
slots.description: Uncapped 2x+ (incl. rent) that feeds a hub.

rules.title: Every Credit Is Mandatory
rules.description: Miss one $10 credit and you owe the group chat $100.

rules.title: Retention = Religion
rules.description: Annual fee posts → secure message/script → 30–60k or PC/cancel. Every card, every year.

rules.title: Business Cards Only For Big Spend
rules.description: Keep personal reports clean, hit SUBs faster, earn more.

name: Points Strategist
tagline: Transfer Partner Only — 5+ cpp or bust
description: Lounges are nice, credits are cute, but you live for ANA business class, Hyatt Globalist on points, and Flying Blue promos. Your redemptions make grown men cry.

slots.name: Primary Transfer Hub
slots.description: Best partners + strong multipliers.

slots.name: Secondary/Alternative Hub
slots.description: For specific sweet spots or backup.

slots.name: Max Multiplier Feeder
slots.description: 2x+ uncapped on everything else → transfer for massive cpp.

rules.title: Portal Is For Mortals
rules.description: You transfer. Always. Minimum 2.5 cpp, preferably 4+.

rules.title: Sweet Spot Calendar Tattooed On Arm
rules.description: You never miss a Flying Blue Promo, Virgin delta award drop, or Hyatt peak change.

name: Business Powerhouse
description: You run millions through cards. Personal limits are irrelevant. Your points pay for first-class team offsites.

slots.name: Ad Spend & Software Beast
slots.description: Maximize 4–5x categories on ads, software, and other business essentials.

slots.name: Uncapped Everything Else
slots.description: Simple, high-earn multipliers on all non-bonus business spend.

slots.name: Travel Redemption Closer
slots.description: Turn all those points into premium travel for you and the team.

rules.title: Ads Routing Bible
rules.description: Meta/Google/TikTok → Biz Gold 4x. Office supply gift cards → Ink Cash 5x.

rules.title: Employee Cards = Free Money
rules.description: Every employee gets one. Their lunch = your Maldives trip.

name: Cashback Pragmatist
tagline: Points Are Cope. Cash Is King.
description: You looked at the points circus, laughed, and took real money instead. Zero annual fees, zero games, maximum sleep.

slots.name: True 2% Core
slots.description: Simple flat-rate cash back everywhere — no tracking, no thinking.

slots.name: 5% Spice (Optional)
slots.description: A little extra work for big boosts on your top categories.

rules.title: No Fee, No Mercy
rules.description: If it has an annual fee, it better give you $1,000+ value.

rules.title: Auto-Redemption To Investments
rules.description: Cash back → brokerage every month. Points people seethe.

name: Foodie & Grocery King
description: Your grocery bill scares normal people. You treat calories like basis points. Every meal must return at least 10% effective.

slots.name: Max Grocery (Capped)
slots.description: 6% up to $6k — you always max it.

slots.name: Unlimited Food Warlord
slots.description: 4x groceries after cap + 4x dining worldwide + credits.

slots.name: Backup/Alternative Food Cards
slots.description: Sidegrades for specific bonus structures or if you also want rent/travel coverage via Bilt.

rules.title: $6,000.01 = Switch to Gold
rules.description: Track it obsessively. Hit cap → Gold for rest of year.

rules.title: Credits Are Non-Negotiable
rules.description: Every $10 dining/Uber Eats/Grubhub credit must be used or you failed.

name: Family Freak
tagline: Groceries for an army, Disney+ bundle, EV charging — all maxed
description: Big family = massive predictable spend. You turn diapers and chicken nuggets into free vacations.

slots.name: 2025 Family God Card
slots.description: 6% groceries ($6k), 6% streaming uncapped, 3% gas/transit.

slots.name: Overflow + Dining Worldwide
slots.description: Overflow grocery/dining after caps plus Bilt if you also want rent and 2x travel/3x dining.

slots.name: Amazon/Target/Walmart Rotators
slots.description: Optimize all big-box and online hauls through quarterly and store-specific bonuses.

rules.title: BCP Until Caps Explode
rules.description: Groceries, streaming, gas for kid runs → BCP first.

rules.title: Quarterly Wholesale Raids
rules.description: Costco/Sam’s/Target in rotation = stock up + gift cards.

name: Gas/EV Charging Freak
tagline: 5%+ on every gallon/kWh or civil unrest
description: Commute or Tesla — doesn't matter. Fuel is your biggest expense and you will destroy it.

slots.name: Quarterly 5% Rotator
slots.description: Chase/Discover 5% quarters when gas/EV is live = go nuclear.

slots.name: Permanent 5% Lock
slots.description: Lock in 5% year-round by pointing your custom category at gas/EV.

slots.name: 3–4% Reliable Backup
slots.description: Solid backup options when quarters or custom categories are already capped.

rules.title: Stack Fuel Apps
rules.description: Upside/GetUpside + card = 30–50¢ off per gallon normal.

rules.title: Costco Gas + Prime Visa
rules.description: If Prime member, always use Prime Visa at Costco pumps.

name: Online Shopping Addict
tagline: 5–15% back online or I’m not buying
description: Amazon, Target, Walmart, everything delivered. Your mailman is on payroll.

slots.name: Quarterly Online Rotator
slots.description: Play the quarterly 5% game on PayPal/online shopping/wholesale clubs.

slots.name: Amazon Prime Beast
slots.description: Max rewards on Amazon and Whole Foods when you live in Bezos’ kingdom.

slots.name: Portal Power
slots.description: Use flexible travel/points cards to stack portals, offers, and solid base earn.

rules.title: Portal Stack Every Purchase
rules.description: Rakuten/TopCashback + card + portal = normal prices are theft.

rules.title: PayPal Quarterly = Extra 5%
rules.description: Route everything possible through PayPal when it's 5% quarter.

name: Simple Minimalist
tagline: One Card. Zero Drama. Maximum Peace.
description: You hate complexity, make great money, just want the best single-card return and to never think about this again.

slots.name: The Only Card
slots.description: Your single go-to card setup — flat rewards or simple travel value with zero mental overhead.

rules.title: Autopay Everything
rules.description: One card, every bill, every purchase. Done. Sleep.

name: Yuppie Flexer
tagline: Metal cards, Centurion access, bottle service energy
description: Young professional in HCOL city. You want the heaviest metal, the best lounges, and to flex at dinner without looking try-hard.

slots.name: Status Symbol
slots.description: Heavy metal, premium lounges, and maximum flex factor at check-in and checkout.

slots.name: Food & Lifestyle Credits
slots.description: High-earning food spend plus lifestyle credits that fund your going-out habit.

slots.name: 2x Feeder
slots.description: Uncapped 2x everywhere for non-bonus spend that quietly feeds your ecosystem.

slots.name: Rent & City Loft
slots.description: If you're renting in an HCOL city, Bilt turns your rent into points while also covering 3x dining and 2x travel.

rules.title: Metal Only At The Table
rules.description: Gold card never sees daylight at dinner. Platinum or Reserve only.

rules.title: Every Credit Or You’re Mid
rules.description: Uber, Saks, airline, Resy, Equinox — hit them all.

name: Value Traveler
tagline: Premium perks, fee fully offset, minimal effort
description: You travel a lot but refuse to pay net annual fees. You want lounges, good redemptions, and easy credits.

slots.name: Core Travel Card
slots.description: One premium-but-efficient travel card that covers lounges, insurance, and decent redemptions.

slots.name: Everyday Feeder
slots.description: 2–5% on daily spend plus Bilt for rent (1x), 3x dining and 2x travel if you rent.

rules.title: $300/$300 Credits Mandatory
rules.description: Book any travel through portal → instant offset → card is free + profit.

rules.title: Transfer Only When >2cpp
rules.description: Otherwise portal 1.5x is fine and brain-dead easy.

name: Category Hunter
description: You live for the quarterly activation reminder. Stacking offers gives you life.

slots.name: Rotating Category Kings
slots.description: Chase and Discover 5% quarters on whatever categories the gods bless this year.

slots.name: Custom Category Lock
slots.description: Lock 5% in your top category plus Bilt as a permanent 3x dining / 2x travel and rent engine when rotations miss.

rules.title: Activate At 12:01am
rules.description: Or you're soft.

rules.title: Max Every Cap
rules.description: Gift cards, charity, whatever — hit $1,500 every quarter.

name: Student Starter
tagline: Build credit while eating out & Ubering
description: College or recent grad, thin file, high food/Uber spend. Easy approval, no AF, solid rewards.

slots.name: Student Daily Driver
slots.description: Easy-approval student cards; add Bilt if you already have solid credit and want rent + 3x dining / 2x travel.

rules.title: Pay In Full Every Month
rules.description: 800+ score incoming.

rules.title: Upgrade Path Ready
rules.description: Graduation → real SavorOne, Freedom Unlimited, etc.

name: Balanced Food & Travel
tagline: Groceries & dining first, nice trips second
description: Big grocery spend, regular dining out, a few nice trips per year. You want strong food rewards + solid travel upside without insanity.

slots.name: Food Heavy Hitter
slots.description: Max out grocery and dining rewards with a two-card combo that prints points and cash back.

slots.name: Travel & Catch-All
slots.description: Portal redemptions, basic insurance, and a place for non-food spend; Bilt adds rent + 3x dining / 2x travel if you rent.

rules.title: Food on Gold (or BCP if under cap)
rules.description: 4x groceries + 4x dining + credits usually wins.

rules.title: Credits Pay The Fee
rules.description: $10 dining + $10 Uber Eats monthly = basically free Gold.

rules.title: Save Points For Big Redemptions
rules.description: Hyatt stays or business class once a year makes it worth it.

name: Drugstore Freak
description: You know every deal, every stack, every resale rate. Drugstore quarters are your Super Bowl.

slots.name: Quarterly Drugstore Rotator
slots.description: Ride the 5% drugstore quarters hard with rotating cards.

slots.name: Permanent Drugstore Lock
slots.description: Lock in 5% at pharmacies year-round on your custom card.

rules.title: VGC/MSR Machine
rules.description: $500 Visa/MC gift cards every visit.

rules.title: Stack Everything
rules.description: Amex Offers + Chase Offers + coupons + Ibotta = free money.

name: Office Supply Freak
description: You manufacture spend like a factory. Staples gift cards are your oxygen.

slots.name: Office Supply Maxer
slots.description: Go all-in on 5% at office supply stores plus utilities.

slots.name: Backup Catch-All
slots.description: Simple, high earners for non-office-supply business expenses.

rules.title: VGC Liquidation Lifestyle
rules.description: Staples → $500 VGC → liquidate → repeat.

rules.title: Utilities On Ink Cash
rules.description: Internet/cable/phone bills = 5x.

name: Streaming Freak
description: Netflix, Spotify, Disney+, Hulu, Apple, Paramount+ — all of them, all 6%.

slots.name: Streaming God Card
slots.description: Put every streaming subscription you own on one uncapped 6% monster.

slots.name: Backup Streaming Cards
slots.description: Use these when BCP isn’t an option or when you want a no-AF setup.

rules.title: Uncapped 6% = Put Everything Here
rules.description: Every streaming sub on BCP. No cap = unlimited.

rules.title: Bundle For One Swipe
rules.description: Disney+/Hulu/ESPN or Spotify Family = maximum efficiency.
